targets.rawSql: select created_at as time, latency_ms from ai_inference_events where model_key='eta' order by 1
select window_end as time, (metrics->>'mae_min')::numeric from ai_accuracy_rollups where model_key='eta' order by 1
select created_at as time, (stats->>'psi')::numeric from ai_drift_snapshots where model_key='eta' order by 1
select window_end, metrics->'groups' as groups from ai_bias_metrics where model_key='eta' order by window_end desc limit 10
